text:
Good morning guys. It is day 2 and today we are going to 
 do a wonderful sailing trip out in the bay of Islands.

Cruising though all these islands and you guys are going to get 
 an in-depth look at what it is to see up here.
I love the colour of this water!

I can't believe I get to see wild bottlenose 
 dolphins, here in the Bay of Islands.

There are so many of them too.. They come up to 
 the boat and they are playing with the rudder.

okay, I'm going to go swim with some live dolphins, yea 
 of course they are live, they are wild though..
Trying to get close to them. Keep an eye out. Ready?
That was so amazing. Oh my gosh...that was crazy....

Wow, my gosh we are on land...haha...so we just stopped at Moturoa island, one of 
 the 144 islands here at the Bay of Islands. That's a lot of islands!
Here for a quick look around,walk around stretch those legs, and have some lunch.

We are at the top of the island. Now 
 what? I guess, back to the boat. Yea.
